Dear Dr. Skornia:
I am conducting a study of methods of measuring or
evaluating reaction to and results of television, radio,
educational television and educational radio. I would
greatly appreciate receiving information concerning
studies of this type which you have done or are familiar
with. Thank you very much.
Very truly yours,
Robert E. Dawson
Research Associate
WILLIAM JAMES GIESE AND ASSOCIATES.
